Articles.Content:
It seems an ISS module has sneaked itself into the pack

Expand your Mir! Double it's lifespan! Ship up more bears!

No it's there because it's actually the TKS_FGB, but it's named ISS_TKS_FGB. And it's interior is in the pack also, that's why it's there.

You know I have been wondering for a while now, With Both you and bobcat doing these really interesting mods. Could you make the service flights in game useful. Say be able to load a service module or cargo pod with, fuel, monoprop or whatever have it launch to one of the stations either Iss, Mir, or even ksp stock built stations fitted with a "Birthing" Module and see a animated unloading of "Cargo Packs" containing whatever the player put in them and have that material added to the resource list of the station. ... Just a thought .. Maybe even find a way of incorporating like Kethane or something like that into it.
Lets keep it on topic of bobcats thread here, PM me with what you want.

Lets keep it on topic of bobcats thread here, PM me with what you want.

Well I was kinda hoping for like a Joint Mod between Lionhead and Bobcat. Something that would be compatible both parts wise as well as aesthetically between bobcat's Mir/Iss and the stuff you're doing and that would also work on Stock built stations.

I'm no modder, can't make as much as a square in 3d modeling so perhaps I'm thinking larger than can be done for KSP. I'm sure something like what I was talking about would require plugins and other things.

just a thought though.
Well the ISS is Lionhead, Bobcat, Wayland, and more.
Are you planning to do a pack on this?:
No he's not, he's already said this, look a few pages back for his opinion.
he said not at the moment but maybe later... so you never know... he might surprise us all and do it.

I have begun work on a MTV-like craft here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/34290-WIP-Mars-Transfer-Vehicle/
Looks interesting, a pity its not Soviet.
Anyone has an album on the American Pack?
Has anyone heard from Bobcat recently? I'm getting slightly worried
He probably made 20 launchers and waits till we all think he had some RL trouble, and then he will release them all
Fiendishly clever of him
Bobcat just uploaded this video 2 days ago. He's fine, but I think he's working his ass off for all of us. Appreciated and all but seriously this guy puts out the product
Indeed, he's my favorite modder with his Soviet,American and ISS packs add realistic systems to my ksp.

Thanks. BobCat fine.

Im just make LER

Oh nice! That is this that pressurized rover they used in desert RATS?

Yes it's also the SEV, it's an interesting vehicle.

Edited June 9, 2013 by WCOLE360
Could you make the windows more transparent?

Cool. I love that LER vehicle I never figured how they planned to get it to the moon though? Anyone seen how they were going to do that?

Does that mod use the TT wheel plugins?

Also, does it have a node on the back or surface attach to carry cargo?

Edited June 9, 2013 by MDBenson

Does that mod use the TT wheel plugins?

No any plugins here

I never figured how they planned to get it to the moon though?

Altair descent stage.
So on the altair topic, are you going to do the cargo variant of Altair?

Nice one Bobcat. Just a modders question: is this rover single part ?

Hidden question: is it possible to make a multi-wheel part? Because I didn't find how to do it.

Nice one Bobcat. Just a modders question: is this rover single part ?

No.

Hidden question: is it possible to make a multi-wheel part? Because I didn't find how to do it.

Mmm...i think possible. DEMV Mark3 have 2 wheels in 1 part. But... for multy wheel rovers best use cleverbobcat plugin.
